speaker: CASTRO
sentence: But the difference between what I support and what you support, Vice President Biden, is that you require them to opt in and I would not require them to opt in.
politifact_statement: Castros attack on Bidens health care plan falls flat
verified_claim: The difference between what I support and what you support, Vice President Biden, is that you require them to opt in to a Medicare public option, and I would not require them to opt in.  They would automatically be enrolled. Thats a big difference.  Are you forgetting what you said two minutes ago?
verified_claim_article_title: Julian Castros attack on Joe Biden for forgetting his health care plan falls f

speaker: SANDERS
sentence: Fifty million of those people lose their private insurance every year when they quit their jobs or they go unemployed or their employer changes their insurance policy.
politifact_statement: Sanders inflates the number of uninsured due to job change
verified_claim: Was it 150 million people on private insurance? 50 million of those people lose their private insurance every year when they quit their jobs, or they go unemployed, or their employer changes their insurance policy.

speaker: BOOKER
sentence: And it's nice to go all the way back to slavery, but dear God, we have a criminal justice system that is so racially biased, we have more African-Americans under criminal supervision today than all the slaves in 1850.

speaker: WARREN
sentence: I was in the United States Senate when 54 senators said let's do background checks, let's get rid of assault weapons, and with 54 senators, it failed because of the filibuster.
